about_the_game:
You will have to play as an elderly man who lives on the island "Squid Heart" and works as a lighthouse keeper. Returning from vacation, he finds that the island has been invaded by workers who plan to cut down all the trees and blow up the island. Not agreeing with this decision, Grandpa decides to engage in an unequal battle to defend his home.

Your task:

- Destroy all the workers who have arrived on the island.

- Defuse the 20 explosives placed all over the island.

Your tools:

Axe - your main weapon.

First aid kits - restore health in case of injury

Opponents:

Workers with various weapons: axes, wrenches and crowbars.

Gameplay:

Explore the island and find the laborers.

Engage in battle and defend yourself from attacks.

Look for first aid kits to restore your health

Disarm the explosives to save the island.

Can you protect Squid Heart from destruction? Play this exciting game and find the answer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
